¶ He in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%>, in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H2388>repaired<s%> them.

For, lo, our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and our <S%H1323>daughters<s%> and our <S%H802>wives<s%> are in <S%H7628>captivity<s%> for this.

Then they <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H6441>in<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, We have <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, with all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, and the <S%H4635>shewbread<s%> <S%H7979>table<s%>, with all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof.
